msg: - removed AbstractFilter, reverting back to "Single Filter Design"

author: norman
msg: First "Prototype" of an Handler which supports more the one "action". See JAMES-614

author: trawick
msg: TimeOut can be set in a vhost context

author: jstrachan
msg: Fix for AMQ-1053. Added support for pluggable message transformation together with an implementation using XStream to marshall ObjectMessage instances as TextMessages. See the XStreamTransformTest to see how a producer can send ObjectMessages but then consumers can see either ObjectMessages or TextMessages depending on their requirements.
